snippet: Danspace Project’s black dance series Parallels came to a close on Saturday with a 10-hour show featuring more than 12 performers.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews final 10-hour program of the black dance series Platform 2012: Parallels, featuring performances by more than 12 dancers, at Danspace Project.
lead_paragraph: Danspace Project’s black dance series Parallels came to a close on Saturday with a 10-hour show featuring more than 12 performers.

headline.seo: Platform 2012: Parallels Concludes at St. Mark’s Church
headline.main: The End of an Affair: Movement Marathon
headline.print_headline: The End of an Affair: Movement Marathon
